name: Bugs Eternal
description:
This is my 3DFPS project. Modifications I made:

  • player gains experience points by killing enemies
  • 7 unique upgrades
  • player can upgrade when enough experience (level up)
  • made an arena-type level so player can upgrade as much as they want
  • player will fight boss after upgrading
  • (also, player can upgrade using the TAB key, if they want pure fun or for testing)

Credits:

Created by Vyacheslav Lyskov
